website_summaries.verdict: Well-rounded whitening formula that is popular among people managing multiple dental issues, including gingivitis and sensitivity.
pros: Formulated with hydrated silica, an effective and non-irritating abrasive
Aids in repairing weakened enamel with stannous fluoride
Formula moves past the gumline to keep gingivitis at bay, which also helps reduce inflammation and gum sensitivity
cons: Touted as an upgraded product, but some consumers find it difficult to discern between this and other Crest toothpastes

customer_reviews.title: This product does exactly what it says it will!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this toothpaste for about 3 weeks and my teeth are so much whiter, and that's not even the main result it advertises! I had gingivitis and my gums were red and sore and they were higher in places than they are supposed to be. Enter, this amazing toothpaste! I no longer have gingivitis and no oral pain for the first time in a long time!! My gums have returned to where they're supposed to be and my smile is beautiful again!!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from my dentist checkup. He is happy with my gums...my last appointment they were concern with my gum receding and the tooth exposed. I think this toothpaste has really helped in keeping my gums and enamel healthier for this tooth. Definitely will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chichi451

customer_reviews.title: Miracle toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: My teeth were painful because of thinning enamel and turning grey. I was unable to use a whitening toothpaste because of pain and sensitivity. I was thinking of having crowns as nothing was working. I found this toothpaste on Amazon and thought, { with great skepticism} , I would give it a go. This toothpaste has completely reversed the problem. My teeth are sparkling white, I have been using this toothpaste several months but noticed the improvement after a few days. I still cannot believe the dramatic improvement and keeping checking in the mirror, yes, sparkling white!
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I have some receding gums because I was a smoker for too many years and don’t go to the dentist often enough. I’ve been using this toothpaste since December and have seen a marked improvement in my gums. The areas where it has just started to recede are 100% better. I have one area that’s not quite there but it’s so much better than it was. Haven’t had any issues with staining and the taste is great. It’s super cheap when you buy 3 here too compared to stores. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Shocked that I’m seeing a difference. Being elderly, you see your teeth changing but not for the best. I like to keep my own teeth and not have to have dentures so I purchased this. It seems to work after two weeks. I’ll post again in three months.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good, But ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Crest Gum Detox paste and the Crest Enamel Paste and am glad they decided to combine them. A caution is the Stannous Fluoride that can stain your teeth but is a more effective Fluoride than Sodium Fluoride. Honestly, I've been using these premium toothpaste for a while now, along with my Water Pik and Oral B, and I still get scolded by my Hygienist who must think I chew tobacco. The biggest negative is the cost, so you have to think if it's worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: F. Pono

customer_reviews.title: I guess its ok
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be alright for gum health but honestly ive been using it for the enamel repair claims because i had a few tooth pulled and the xrays showed i had other cavities looming that could get worse.I dont think it was beneficial at all i still had 2 more teeth pulled and currently i have another impending one getting ready to go. Note i been doing the twice a day and flossing crap and even a mouth wash that restores enamel. It didnt help. I do enjoy candy every day so perhaps you need to brush 3 times a day or something but doubt that works. Ive been using it for over a year by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Muh4kin ExQuire

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I never cared about what brand of toothpaste i used until i tried this. was surprised by my dentist to find my gums were screwed and bought this to help. after a month my gums are noticeably better. Will never use another brand even if my gums are perfect at the moment
customer_reviews.author: zolghy

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this Crest Gum & Enamel Toothpaste for a week now and....
customer_reviews.text: ....it's just GREAT!! My gums are getting better, slowly but surely, and my teeth are feeling less slippery when I grind them at night. In about 3 or 4 weeks my gums will probably stop bleeding and my enamel should be better than it already is. I say you should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Feffy58

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans teeth
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my teeth and gums. It is a little pricey but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste, got ripped off when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of three, I only got one but got charged for all 3. I love the tooth paste itself, I have naturally thin enamel and it has helped my cavities, but I just got ripped off and I am not happy. Due to this lockdown I can't even talk to someone to send me my missing product. I needed a few bottles because I will be in the Alaska wilderness for the next 5 months, and I don't know if I will be able to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: Really good toothpaste that actually works and protects. Not only it protects but it also REPAIRS. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kittykat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothpaste...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good toothpaste, I've been using it for awhile and it's made a difference. I used to buy it at Walmart but its a much better deal on Amazon. If you're not happy with your toothpaste give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The best Tooth Paste I've ever tried to help Gums!
customer_reviews.text: The best Tooth Paste I've ever tried to help Gums! Iwas very skeptical at first but after 1 week I could see and feel the difference! After 1 month it was a complete transformation! My mouth and gums are feeling great! An absolute must have item. I will never buy another tooth paste again!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for my teeth, gums and mouth
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toothpaste. Using other brands I started waking up with a foul taste in my mouth, which went away with this. Also had tooth sensitivity with other brands. It really makes your mouth, teeth and gums feel good. This is all I use now.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: when to the dentist and he can even see the improvement. your teeth will look & feel cleaner and better .
customer_reviews.author: Vaneese B.

customer_reviews.title: Maintains gums health
customer_reviews.text: During this time of only emergency visits to the dentist, the Crest toothpaste has greatly improved the quality of my gums. They no longer bleed during brushing and the product in the 3 pack is a super value. I use this product in the evening and my whitening Crest product in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does help with gums. I was having slight signs of gingivitis and started using this and it has helped a lot
customer_reviews.author: Sofia d.

customer_reviews.title: Deceitful {very sneaky}
customer_reviews.text: Clearly states in product details: Contains three 4.1 oz. toothpastes. Contains "three" you are only getting "one" tube . COMPLETE RIPOFF
customer_reviews.author: Sue J.

customer_reviews.title: First check up was great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this paste. I was using a product that went from $19 to $44 per tube. They are nuts. I get a check up every 90 days. I will let Amazon know if it's not good.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Clean mouth
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this the other day definitely makes my mouth feel a lot cleaner then the regular crest pro health
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie b.

customer_reviews.title: Great deep clean feeling!
customer_reviews.text: Great deep clean, exactly what I was looking for to maintain my teeth between dentist visits.
customer_reviews.author: carbonic

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t seemed to work and leaves a dry taste in mouth but I have 3 now so I’ll keep trying
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as described!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a 3-pack. Only received one!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great great toothpaste. Makes your teeth feel super clean ! Love the taste... not overly minty or intense; just right. Doubt I’ll ever use any other toothpaste!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Missing the other two.
customer_reviews.text: It said there was 3 tubes with the order and I only received 1, and I couldn't get anywhere when asking about it just if I was returning it which I was just hoping they would send the other 2 tubes of toothpaste. I do really like this brand though.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Frothy nice tasting toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste has a different feel from most. It’s very foamy. I like it. I don’t know if it actually helps the gums, but it feels good to use it and feels like I’m getting a deep clean
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Fiegleman

customer_reviews.title: Really “Amazons choice”?
customer_reviews.text: Intentionally misleading 3-pack picture. It’s just one. Disappointed that it’s “Amazons choice” for lies and poor value for money
customer_reviews.author: Gsklyr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS TOOTHPAST IS WONDERFUL. IT CLEANS YOUR WHOLE MOUTH AND YOUR GUMS. CREST ALWAYS HAS A GREAT PRODUCT THAT DUE WHAT IT SAYS
customer_reviews.author: NITA

customer_reviews.title: Like How They Stand
customer_reviews.text: Most toothpaste tubes have to lie down and are messy. I like how these stand on the cap so always look neat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brands

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toothpaste on the shelves, in my opinion. If there’s a better one, I haven’t found it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Missing 2 Tubes
customer_reviews.text: Why did I only receive 1 tube when three were to come? I hate that I paid almost $15 for 1 tube of toothpaste. Please send the other two. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Check the expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in Feb. and opened it last week. With the protective plastic wrap on all 3 tubes, I couldn’t see the expiration date, which is July 2020. The manufacturer says it was made 2 years before the expiration date, so I have old toothpaste. I do like this product, that’s why I ordered 3 tubes, but I assumed it would have a longer shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: regina paronish

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: It's typically cheaper on Amazon than in-store, and it's by far the best toothpaste I've ever used. Your mouth feels clean for most of the day, even after eating meals.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: not a three pack
customer_reviews.text: this is not a three pack i only got one and seems like alot of other people had that same problem
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Wrong info or crazy expensive?
customer_reviews.text: Beware, the description and the picture show 3 tubes. I received one tube for $15.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value to get from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Decent three pack for the money she could get on Amazon then at your local store fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Delite

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Don't see any gum or enamel repair happening after three months, but overall good toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Apollyon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is less expensive than buying at my store. Paste works well
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my teeth feel and the idea that I could repair gums and enamel

customer_reviews.title: Good tooth paste
customer_reviews.text: Great item taste good and dose it job will continue to buy
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kamerick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale. Yes they're definitely worth the range of $3-5/ea.
customer_reviews.author: Atom Herr

customer_reviews.title: Only received one box.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. The description tells you you are getting three boxes of toothpaste. I only received one. Have to return. Kind of inconvenient. :/
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about toothpaste? It tastes good, nice and minty. It doesn't leave a weird after-taste or feeling in your mouth. This particular formula seems to help with hot/cold sensitivity. I am still a little surprised when I see the price of toothpaste but it's a three pack, it will last a while and it's quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Legit product
customer_reviews.text: As expected and in good condition , will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Wowo

customer_reviews.title: Bit Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good and it tingles. Seems to help my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleGirl2016

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great works well on my teeth and not bad tasting 👍😉
customer_reviews.author: ree

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Clearly shows 3 packages, and I only received one. $15 for one tube of toothpaste. Very deceptive. Would like the other 2 packages to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Got the best visit for my dentist shortly after I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Only get one tube of tooth paste
customer_reviews.text: You only get one tube of tooth paste for the price not 3 like in the product picture. Good product misleading advertising

customer_reviews.title: had to return only came with one 4.1oz tube not the three as described
customer_reviews.text: had to return only came with one 4.1oz tube not the three as described and still charged the full price
customer_reviews.author: Absolut Services Inc

customer_reviews.title: Only 1
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a good product but I only received 1 and the description says their should be 3. Very unhappy.

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: I received 1 tube when it clearly offers 3. Complete rip off
customer_reviews.author: Brandon H

customer_reviews.title: The package
customer_reviews.text: I have received the package which is protected by 3 plastic bags. I would like to note that the second plastic bag was torn open when I have received it. I have taken the extra precaution while receiving and opening the package. Nonetheless, I'm satisfied with my toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad

customer_reviews.title: Received 1 tube not 3 tubes
customer_reviews.text: Hey Amazonions, I love this toothpaste and nothing is more convenient then amazons delivery. I received 1 tube not 3 as pictured. Pretty expensive considering +$14... oh well. Will change this review if corrected but no news yet. -Peter
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mike-Mayer

customer_reviews.title: I only got 1 tube
customer_reviews.text: I only received one tube, not a 3 pack. Way way too much for 1 tube of toothpaste! Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell how it’s repairing.
customer_reviews.text: There’s not a discernible difference between this product and the “total” toothpaste.

customer_reviews.title: Receive amount purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste. Received just one tube, not the package pictured.

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste, really works
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite toothpaste. I even bought one for each of my adult son's to try.

customer_reviews.title: Inflammation better after a few used
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than regular product it helps your gum in a long term.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: This product description is not correct, it advertised a 3 pack of toothpaste for $14.99 but I only received one tube. There is no toothpaste worth spending almost $15 a tube.

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd time purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste. It actually works. If you have sensitive teeth or anything it will stop it. The first couple days I use it I notice a difference.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper to buy this trio than individual bottles at the store. Very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive full order
customer_reviews.text: Only received one of the three tubes of toothpaste. Now I have to return one tube of toothpaste to receive refund.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can never go back to using other toothpastes.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thick consistency
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste was so thick that it won’t rinse off my toothbrush. It’s almost putty-like. I suspect it was not stored properly, so beware!

customer_reviews.title: One tube instead of 3
customer_reviews.text: Only received one tube when I was supposed to have 3, paid a bit much for just one tube.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! All mouth sores gone since using it!

customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I would have given 0 stars!! Says “3 pack” well I received ONE tube!!!! Unbelievable. Going right back! FALSE ADVERTISING!!

customer_reviews.text: I only received one box out of the 3 - sucks

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of the same item as a package deal I only received one of the 3

customer_reviews.title: misleading description
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description indicate you get 3 tubes for $14.99, but only 1 tube was received. Very expensive toothpaste.

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: incomplete order. offer stated 3 ea 4.1 tubes . received only one tube

customer_reviews.text: This time I only received 1 tube of toothpaste. Same price . Never had this problem before.

customer_reviews.title: Only received one tube
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I bought a three-pack, but only one was tube was delivered.

customer_reviews.title: Only received one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a triple pack, but only received one individual tube.

customer_reviews.title: Totally got ripped off!
customer_reviews.text: I only received 1 though it is listed as 3. RIP off!

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Only received one of the 3 I was supposed to get! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Justin Credible

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My teeth don’t hurt anymore when I eat sugar and are looking whiter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing two items
customer_reviews.text: There is only one toothpaste instead of three as listed.
customer_reviews.author: liu dayong

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive a pack of 3 but only 1
customer_reviews.text: Why did I only receive one while it said a pack of 3 for $14.99?
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Are you tired of toothpaste that seems like sugar?
customer_reviews.text: I had been using another Crest product for a while but always felt like I was brushing my teeth with sugar. Sorry if that sounds weird. But I tried this Gum and Enamel repair and it works. And on top of it doing what it says it will do, I don't feel like I just ate a sugar cube after brushing my teeth. They feel great and clean. Which is what I was looking for. Also on my first order there was a mess up where I ordered a multi pack and just received a single. The seller fixed the issue right away. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PRA7 Reviews

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS
customer_reviews.text: This really works well. It foams up in your mouth and you just spit out the extra. Do not rinse. Taste is good and I have seen improvement on my gums and teeth. Since this is much more expensive then regular toothpaste. I will brush my teeth first with regular toothpaste rinse, then I use my Listerine mouth wash spit most of it out then use small amount of this toothpaste using the small amount mouth wash left in my mouth. Brush, Spit and done. You can see and feel the difference in just a few days
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Defective mechandise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toothpaste in hopes of fighting gum disease, but the seams of the tube break (seriously, even after the 2nd or third use of a new tube? I bought a three pack and both of the first two I used did this. I have no idea how good this product works really because (the dispenser / tube breaks as soon as you use it) The seams squirt out from the side when you use it. Terrible. I never write anything bad. I like everybody. But, I was very let down on just how bad this once 'main stream reputable brand product' was. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JWF productions

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I started using Crest Gum & Enamel Repair because I had tooth pain that seemed to be leading to another root canal. I didn't want to face that and was looking for something to strengthen my tooth and repair the enamel. This began to work within a few days. It has done an amazing job or restoring my tooth and I no longer have sensitivity to hot and cold like I was having. I have tried other toothpastes of this type and they do not do as good of a job and the taste is terrible. I will only use this toothpaste from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Travel

customer_reviews.title: Missing product
customer_reviews.text: The product information says, “triple pack”, but I only received one box. Incredibly disappointed. Hope I get two more or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I brushed to hard and scrubbed some of my enamel away on my front teeth. I purchased this toothpaste to try and counteract the damage that I have caused. With this toothpaste I have already started to see the signs reduce.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Anything Special?????
customer_reviews.text: After buying these I wondered if it included any special ingredients. I couldn't find any ingredients other than whats included in its standard toothpaste. How did I know if it was working? I asked my periodontist and he couldn't say whether or not it worked. For the upgraded priced I don't think I got an upgraded product. I went back to the standard.
customer_reviews.author: Global Traveler

customer_reviews.title: tooth paste
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this product from amazon.you can go to the store and buy this cheaper. I though I was getting three and I only got one for 15 dollars.not worth it.the tooth paste is good but not for 15 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Root Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it works for me gum problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it will work on my gingivitis problem. I have a DDS appt in a month, with xrays due, so I will come back and update my progress.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Started to use this and I am now on the second tube. No longer have bleeding gums, so something good is happening.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Really does repair damage, especially when combined with the Crest intense mouthwash. It doesnt taste bad, either.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is repairing my gums and enamel, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to quantify the gum or enamel repairing of this tooth paste, so I can't say for sure it is repairing as it claims, but I trust Crest.
customer_reviews.author: Bert in Chicago who is a happy and loyal Amazon Customer. :-)

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: After using a tube of this toothpaste, I just went for a periodic cleaning and got a great report from the dentist! So it's obviously working well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Malis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go without
customer_reviews.text: Great product and cost comparable to a “dollar” store price when you order this way.
customer_reviews.author: Dink's mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Only through a half tube so far. I prefer a stronger flavor- this is pretty mild. I’m not overly impressed with this toothpaste but it does it’s job. I’ll probably order more when done with this 3pk just because it states to be “gum & enamel repair” and I like the value
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: It's my go-to paste
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure to go by the 2 by 2 rule, twice a day for two minutes!
customer_reviews.author: David Krahl

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Has been helping me build up the enamel on my one back tooth. Now I have enough and don't have to worry about running out. Great product that actually does what it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste ever for gentle whitening and gum health. Cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: my review is not gonna help
customer_reviews.text: it's different than what Im used to, sensydyne but it defiantly does its job
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sather

product_meta.title: Crest Gum & Enamel Repair Toothpaste, Advanced Whitening, 4.1oz (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Style:Gum & Enamel RepairGum problems are the root of some key oral health issues, use Crest Gum & Enamel Repair toothpaste to prevent gingivitis while receiving the benefits of Crest. Clinically proven to help reverse gingivitis. It targets the gumline to kill plaque germs and penetrates the tooth's surface to repair weakened enamel for healthier teeth and gums.
feature_bullets: Crest Gum & Enamel Repair toothpaste formulated for Advanced Whitening
Treats issues at the gum line to help reverse gum problems
Clinically proven to help reverse gingivitis. Hydrated silica is a mild abrasive for gentle and effective cleaning
Penetrates tooth surface to repair weakened enamel

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
